entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High plus 2.
